events.message: I received my order last week but the product is not what I expected, so I would like to request a refund.
The customer's message indicated a refund request due to dissatisfaction with the product received.
Case assigned to refund specialist agent to handle the refund process for the customer.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you want to request a refund and I am here to assist you.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason you want to request a refund, so we can process it accordingly?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. The product color was completely different from what was shown on the website.
Thank you for the details. We can proceed with a full refund for your order once you return the product using the prepaid shipping label we will provide.
That sounds good, I appreciate the quick response and solution. Please send me the shipping label as soon as possible.
We have emailed you the prepaid shipping label. Once we receive the product back, your refund will be processed within 5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm if you were able to return the product and if your refund was processed to your satisfaction.
Yes, I returned the product yesterday and I received confirmation the refund was completed today. Thank you very much!
We are glad your refund has been processed successfully. Closing this case now. Have a great day!
We have sent a satisfaction survey to your email to hear your feedback about this support experience.
